resources.string: "v0.8.3 - Themed nav buttons - Framework tweak - Brightened up documentsUI wallpaper - - v0.8.2 - Tested and working on android 5.1 (euphoria, hammerhead) - Themed Launcher3 - Themed Reddit News Pro (night mode) - Made nova folder background configurable - Check xda version for themed google +! - Fixed up calculator - Fixed menu transparency issue - Tweaked MMS - Tweaked gmail - New app icon v0.8.1 - Quick fix for white actionbar - System UI is more transparent - Colored FAB for dialer and contacts v0.8.0 - Themed Google Keyboard - Fixed up google search - Themed AOSP messaging - Themed AOSP music - Recolored dialer and contacts - Added parts to system ui - Started using sdk 22 v0.7.8 - Added ripples to a lot of areas - Themed newest nova launcher (join beta) - Made youtube settings readable - Fully themed contacts - Themed more system ui v0.7.7 - Fixed up play store - Reintroduced dialer and contacts - Themed emergency dial and mobile networks, plus a bit more - Potential fix for dialog pop ups showing just the wallpaper - Added FAB in the app to launch the theme chooser (thanks Ivon) v0.7.6 - Removed dialer and contact theming (too buggy, use the xda version if you want it) - Added border along toast messages v0.7.5 - Fixed issue with primary light text - Improved on gmail, more transparency and black dropdown - Darkened snapchat\'s splash color - Downsized the bootanimation in hopes of supporting phones with hdpi and under (you can still get the xxhdpi version on android file host) v0.7.4 - Updated google to latest update (feb 26) - Slightly darkened settings - Cleaned up google + code v0.7.3 - Nerfed holo colors - Fixed up some gmail components - Themed a few modules - Themed theme.holo related styles - Fixed up SystemUI a bit v0.7.2 - Made google now drawer text a bit lighter - Made dialer search background black - Themed xposed - Materialized theme engine drawer - Fixed euphoria OTA v0.7.1 - Initial changelog - Testing in progress"

string-array.name: v0_8_2
string-array.item: Tested and working on android 5.1 (euphoria, hammerhead)
Check xda version for themed google +!

string-array.name: v0_8_1
string-array.item: Colored FAB for dialer and contacts

string-array.name: v0_7_8
string-array.item: Added ripples to a lot of areas

string-array.name: v0_7_7
string-array.item: Themed emergency dial and mobile networks, plus a bit more
Potential fix for dialog pop ups showing just the wallpaper
Added FAB in the app to launch the theme chooser (thanks Ivon)

string-array.name: v0_7_6
string-array.item: Removed dialer and contact theming (too buggy, use the xda version if you want it)

string-array.name: v0_7_5
string-array.item: Fixed issue with primary light text
Improved on gmail, more transparency and black dropdown
Downsized the bootanimation in hopes of supporting phones with hdpi and under (you can still get the xxhdpi version on android file host)

string-array.name: v0_7_2
string-array.item: Made google now drawer text a bit lighter
